Title: Blow-Up
Production_Co: Bridge Films, Carlo Ponti Production, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer (MGM)
Cast: Vanessa Redgrave, Sarah Miles, David Hemmings, John Castle, Jane Birkin, Gillian Hills, Peter Bowles, Veruschka von Lehndorff, Julian Chagrin, Claude Chagrin
Plot: A mod London photographer seems to find something very suspicious in the shots he has taken of a mysterious beauty in a desolate park. A successful mod photographer in London whose world is bounded by fashion, pop music, marijuana, and easy sex, feels his life is boring and despairing. Then he meets a mysterious beauty, and also notices something frightfully suspicious on one of his photographs of her taken in a park. The fact that he may have photographed a murder does not occur to him until he studies and then blows up his negatives, uncovering details, blowing up smaller and smaller elements, and finally putting the puzzle together. Written by Anonymous
Keywords: photograph, photographer, park, fashion, blow up
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 7 wins & 6 nominations.
Location: 77 Pottery Lane, Notting Hill, London, England, UK
Actors: David Hemmings, Vanessa Redgrave, Sarah Miles
Writer: Michelangelo Antonioni (story), Julio Cortázar (short story "Las babas del diablo") (as Julio Cortazar) | 3 more credits »
Description: Directed by Michelangelo Antonioni.  With David Hemmings, Vanessa Redgrave, Sarah Miles, John Castle. A mod London photographer seems to find something very suspicious in the shots he has taken of a mysterious beauty in a desolate park.
